cab.content: his Document is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty^ Government.)Secret.1305Front Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, to Secretary of Slate for Indiamh February 1920. (Received 27th.)91 A. North-West Frontier Province. Chief Commissioner reports on 25th February that Khost lashkar, 2,000 strong, consisting of Mangals and Zadrans attacked Kurram near Lakka Tigga. They were severely defeated by Tuns and Kurram Militia and retired leaving 120 dead and 20 rifles. Our casualties slight.
